title: US Stocks Drop as Weak Retail Sales Set Tone in Data-Heavy Week
description: US stocks declined as investors examined the first of several key economic data releases this week for clues on the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path.
content: US stocks declined as investors examined the first of several key economic data releases this week for clues on the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path.
